definition: special/unique/distinguished/especially/unusual/very/abbr. for 特克斯[te4 ke4 si1], tex

sentences.english: I have the pleasure to inform you that I have entered into partnership with Mr. K. Kono.
sentences.chinese: 本人已与河野谦吉先生合伙营业，特此奉告。

sentences.english: We acquaint you that we have established ourselves as general agents under the title of Chambers Co.
sentences.chinese: 我们将以钱伯斯公司为名，开设总代销店，特此奉告。

sentences.english: This letter is to inform you that we have lately obtained a patent for a new type propulsion system for aircraft.
sentences.chinese: 我方的飞机新型推进系统已获专利权，特此函告。

sentences.english: Please be advised that I will have a five-day business trip to Chicago effective from today night.
sentences.chinese: 特此通知，小弟将于今晚乘机远赴芝加哥公干五天。

sentences.english: This letter is to inform you that we have lately obtain a patent for an improved method of aluminum solder.
sentences.chinese: 我们改进的铝焊接法最近获得专利权，特此函告。

sentences.english: Notice is here to inform that the score of PETS can be checked through the campus Network.
sentences.chinese: 本次PETS成绩可以在校园网上查阅，特此通知。

sentences.english: I hereby declare that he is an employee of my company .
sentences.chinese: 他是我公司职员，特此证明。

sentences.english: We intimate to you that we have issued a commercial letter of credit.
sentences.chinese: 我们已开出商业信用证，特此通知。

sentences.english: I hereby declare you man and wife.
sentences.chinese: 本人特此宣布你们结为夫妇。

sentences.english: The purpose of this letter is to inform you that the goods are despatched by Canal to Hamburg.
sentences.chinese: 这批货物已经由运河发往汉堡，特此通知。

sentences.english: The size of our products has been increased, and we would like to inform you as following.
sentences.chinese: 我们的产品尺寸已经增加，特此通知如下。

sentences.english: IN WITNESS WHEREOF, the parties have executed this agreement as of the date first above written.
sentences.chinese: 本协议由双方于前文所述日期签字，特此证明。

sentences.english: We hereby revoke the agreement of May8, 2004.
sentences.chinese: 这项特此宣告2004年5月8日的协议无效。

sentences.english: I hereby sentence you one year at a correctional facility .
sentences.chinese: 我特此宣判你在感化院呆一年。

sentences.english: Now the student in my company has already concluded, this is to certify that.
sentences.chinese: 现在该学生在我公司已经实习结束，特此证明。

definition: to express gratitude (esp. in public)/vote of thanks
expression of gratitude/to give thanks/a thank-you note/acknowledgement
to come with a specific purpose in mind
for the benefit of the reader
my unworthy manuscript (humble expr.)/my humble writing
on this (occasion)/at this time when .../on this occasion
to point out mistakes or weak points for correction/to comment/criticism
